entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [wasm] timeout in System.Runtime.Tests #76110
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: {Last}IndexOf{AnyExcept}Range #76106
    8.0.0
  • List<> should use faster write barriers #76104
  • [wasm][debugger] Catch another unhandled exception in .js file after catching First Chance Exception #76101
    8.0.0
  • Address-exposure of promoted struct fields used by instance methods #76096
    8.0.0
  • [External] Consumption of external source has suppressed warnings #76095
    8.0.0
  • #73155 Remove 1024 character limit on ODBC connection strings Fix works in .NET 6 but not in Framework 4.X #76094
  • Mono interpreter crashing when calling constructor with 1000 parameters #76093
  • JIT/CheckProjects tool isn't used correctly in CI #76087
  • .NET Logging after IHost Shutdown #76084
  • ILGenerator.Emit produces Method not found #76082
  • Loading a self-contained executable with custom runtime host returns error about missing .deps.json file #76080
  • [NativeAOT] Switch to native arm64 msvc toolset #76079
    8.0.0
  • WASM: GL object no longer accessible in .net 7 (Skiasharp) #76077
    7.0.x
  • JIT: Improve last-use copy omission for implicit byrefs #76069
    8.0.0
  • Suboptimal ASM emmited for Vector256<T>.Zero and Vector128<T>.Zero #76067
    Future
  • Operations on halfs of a Vector256 #76066
  • [wasm-mt] [uno] HttpClient calls fail with Unknown converter for type 13 #76063
    8.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Support multidimensional indexing of `object` scheme #76062
    8.0.0
  • Unhandled inner exception for NativeOverlapped used for multiple operations #76060
  • CPU intensive process left running after closing a winforms .Net6 app that uses OleDB #76054
    Future
  • Undocumented 7.0 APIs as of RC1 #76049
    7.0.0
  • Improve Vector128.ExtractMostSignificantBits for arm64 #76047
    Future

Closed

  • CI failure: System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.Tests.CertificateCreation.CertificateRequestLoadTests.VerifySignature_RSA_PSS(hashAlgorithm: "SHA512") #76099
  • .NET AWS Lambda function using .NET 7 RC1 fails to start when using a custom runtime on AWS Linux 2 on arm64 #75622
  • System.Text.Encoding.CodePages #76102
  • > There shouldn't be any long-lived pinning happening on other OSes. This is inherent to the Windows model for overlapped I/O, where the buffers are supplied to the receive/read calls performing the I/O; on Linux/macOS/etc., a buffer is only supplied under the covers once the implementation is notified data is available. I realize this isn't the intent of your issue, but if you have evidence of this happening anywhere other than Windows, I'd be interested in seeing it. #76100
  • Test failure: JIT/opt/OSR/largefuncletframe/largefuncletframe.sh #76085
    8.0.0
  • Test failure JIT\\HardwareIntrinsics\\X86\\Avx1\\ConvertToVector_ro\\ConvertToVector_ro.cmd #75942
    8.0.0
  • Test failure GC/Features/HeapExpansion/bestfit/bestfit.sh #75941
    8.0.0
  • Project segfaults on Ubuntu ( ARM64 ) #76051
    7.0.0
  • HttpClient creates Quic threads even if HTTP/3 is not in use #74629
    7.0.0
  • Test failure baseservices\\exceptions\\unittests\\RecursiveThrowNew\\RecursiveThrowNew.cmd #75944
    8.0.0
  • Expression compilation is slower in Net7. #76058
  • Crash - JIT/CheckProjects/CheckProjects/CheckProjects.sh #76070
    8.0.0
  • [WASM runtime test infrastucture] Environment variable is not set: 'CORE_ROOT' #41520
    7.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'vnWx != NoVN' during 'Redundant branch opts' #72767
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [wasm] Few perf-pipeline improvements #76111
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-coreclr, perf-pipeline
  • Fix DiagnosticSource to work with NativeAOT #76109
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing
  • JIT: refactor jump threading a bit #76108
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] [wasm] Don't use MS.Build.NoTargets SDK for runtime tests #76107
    area-Infrastructure
  • Ensure Vector64/128/256.Create APIs are intrinsic #76105
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix triple slash documentation for System/System.Numerics #76103
    area-System.Numerics
  • Resolve missing triple-slash in Microsoft.Extensions.Primitives #76098
    area-Extensions-Primitives
  • Reduce allocations around empty ReadOnlyCollections #76097
    area-System.Collections
  • [release/7.0] [wasm] Add workaround for msbuild issue in tests #76090
    area-Infrastructure
  • Bring back ReadOnlySpan in QuicStream #76088
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] [mono][debugger] fix exception while decoding value that has a byref field #76086
    Servicing-approved, area-Debugger-mono
  • [WIP] Make sure the initial mark list size is capped #76083
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Unroll SpanHelpers.Reverse() for Vector128 #76076
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] [wasm][debugger] Fix debugging an app that has another .NET Wasm instance in a service worker #76075
    Servicing-consider, area-Debugger-mono
  • [release/7.0] [wasm][debugger] Fix debugging an app that has another .NET Wasm instance in a service worker #76073
    Servicing-consider, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix debugging an app that has another .NET Wasm instance in a service worker #76072
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [NativeAOT/iOS] Fix System.Private.Xml tests #76071
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • Use generated runtime.json when building shared framework packages. #76068
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Support indexing by non-numbers #76065
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 8.0.0
  • ZipArchive.CreateEntry: include file type in default ExternalAttributes. #76059
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] Enable EventSource support in crossgen2 #76056
    Servicing-consider, area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Disable EventSource support in NativeAOT by default #76052
    Servicing-consider, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] [NativeAOT] Ensure that frozen objects respect the minimum object size #76050
    Servicing-consider, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix impIntrinsic to not raise asserts for the AltJit scenario #76048
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • [wasm][debugger] Support create, debugging and running wasmbrowser template from VS #75986
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [JIT] CodeGen verification testing #75102
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [tests] Skip XslCompiledTransformApi tests on iOS, tvOS, and when testing native AOT #75730
  • [mono][interp] Remove random interp limit #76092
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • CI: trigger library tests builds, when building runtime tests #76057
    area-Infrastructure
  • [workloads] Work around main still targeting net7.0 #76036
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Disabling finalizer tests pending investigation. #76089
  • Adapt System.CommandLine (v2) in more places #72082
    blocked, area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Use gtCloneExpr in fgMorphModToSubMulDiv for potentially complex trees #76061
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Do not maintain `GTF_VAR_MULTIREG` before lowering #75449
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Disallow `ASG(..., IND<struct>)` before morph #74715
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Do not remove certain casts with contained operands #74602
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Update gtHasLocalsWithAddrOp to use GenTreeVisitor #75672
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Close MsQuic after checking for QUIC support to free resources (#75163, #75441) #75521
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • JIT: properly update trees in optOptimizeBoolsGcStress #75992
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Move TargetsLinuxBionic property, which depends on OutputRid #76078
  • Disable CheckProjects test on llvmaot. #76074
  • [release/7.0] Add missing DynamicallyAccessMembers attributes to System.Data.Common/ref #75980
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Data, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Enable EventSource support in crossgen2 #76053
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] Ensure that frozen objects respect the minimum object size #76031
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [MONO][TEST] Update issues.targets for CheckProjects tests #76022
    test-enhancement, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fix Dictionary perf regression for non-string ref type keys #75663
    area-System.Collections, tenet-performance
  • Disable EventSource support in NativeAOT by default #76000
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: fix issue with unreachable blocks in redundant branch opt #76040
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • ActivatorUtilities not depending on ctor order for creating instances #75846
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • Only R2R public methods, methods that override public methods, and internal methods that aren't always inlined #75793
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Fix numeric IntPtr behavioral changes analyzer findings #75557
    area-Meta
  • Memory model document. #75790
    area-Meta, memory model
  • Introduce a source generator for invoking methods on unmanaged vtables #68276
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • [release/6.0] Remove locks from COM events delegate management. #76035
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 6.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Remove locks from COM events delegate management. #76034
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.x
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0-rc2' => 'release/7.0' #75913
  • [wasm] Keep all icall wrappers in profile only mode, the generated co… #75918
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Clean up of SPC to match ref assembly public surface for Mono and CoreCLR #75954
    area-Infrastructure
  • [release/7.0] Flow internal transport packages during servicing #75979
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Remove closed issues from issues.targets #75363
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [mono] Add Vector128 ConditionalSelect intrinsics for Amd64 #75838
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • [wasi] prevent mono on wasi from crashing on GC #76023
    area-GC-mono
  • Remove hardcoded limit in deserialization constructor arguments #75982
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Add back missing conv opcodes when compiling via System.Linq.Expressions #76024
    area-System.Linq.Expressions
  • Update il range in optOptimizeBoolsUpdateTrees #74657
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Add more optimizations for (https://github.com/dotnet/runtime/issues/61412) #74806
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Adding EVEX encoding support for emitOutputRRR(). #75934
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Fix spilling of `MUL_LONG` on x86 and multi-reg HWIs #73079
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Make WriteCommentValue() overloads have same behavior; Make the Utf8JsonWriter always insert newlines between the end of comments and the start of arrays or objects #75074
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • WIP: [mono] Include inspection of CustomConstantAttribute when resolving default values for parameters via reflection #75612
    area-System.Reflection-mono
  • JIT: Evaluate GDV call args early #75634
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [mono][debugger] fix exception while decoding value that has a byref field #75774
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Implement DivRem intrinsic for X86 #66551
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [Mono][Test]Disable failing iossimulator tests #74889
  • Delete a bit more `OBJ(ADDR(...))` wrapping from `impNormStructVal` #74784
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fold SIMD-typed partial access to locals; delete base types from vector constants #74580
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [Mono][Test] Collapse mono runtime tests into single builds using global-build-job template #62863
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Support a few "shifted register" operations on Arm64 #75823
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • emit branchless form of (i >= 0 && j >= 0)/(i!=0&& j!= 0) for signed integers #62689
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Implement IEEE754 totalOrder comparer #75517
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • SPMI: Add and utilize number of contexts with diffs #76011
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Improve List<T>.AddRange performance for enumerables #76043
    area-System.Collections
  • Add initial support for Freebsd.arm64 #71486
    arch-arm64, os-freebsd, area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • runtime: add RIDs for anolis distro #66132
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • [mono][aot] Prefer specific instances instead of gshared for methods … #76033
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Ensure gc collects memory for CriticalFinalizer test #76046
    community-contribution
  • Improve IPAddress to/from bytes perf #75872
    area-System.Net
  • Extend RuntimeHelpers.IsBitwiseEquatable to more types #75640
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Fix System.Runtime.InteropServices tests #75669
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Enable IDE0060 (Remove unused parameter) analyzer #72667
    area-Meta
